artist: Artist: Circle of Higo Busshi Jōkei
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: demonic figure standing on two subdued, grimacing demons, one of whom is looking up with bloodshot eyes; figure is standing with wide stance, PR arm raised to hold separate staff, PL hand open, with hole to hold separate golden spindle; demons mount onto base, and tabs on figure's feet insert into demons; separate halo with golden flames mounts to back
medium: Polychromed wood with inlaid crystal eyes (all three figures), cut gold-leaf; metal
title: Guardian of the North (Bishamonten)
